message: I'm excited to offer you this product for $100! It's a great deal, and I'm confident you'll love it. Plus, it's a one-time offer, so you won't find it at this price anywhere else. What do you say? Will you take it off my hands?
I'm not sure about the quality of the product, so I'll have to pass for now. I'll wait for the next round to see if I get a better offer.

I understand your concerns, Bob! But I want to assure you that this product is still a great value at $100. In fact, I've had other customers who have purchased similar products and loved them. Would you like me to send you some testimonials from satisfied customers? I think it'll give you a better idea of what to expect.
I appreciate the testimonials, but I'm still not convinced. I'd like to see more information about the product itself before making a decision.

I completely understand your hesitation, Bob! But I think this product is a game-changer. It's one of our top-of-the-line models, and I'm confident you'll be thrilled with its performance. I'm willing to make a special offer just for you - I'll throw in a premium warranty and a personalized setup session, worth $20, absolutely free. That's a total value of $120 for just $100. What do you say? Is this the deal that convinces you to take the plunge?
I appreciate the extras, but I'm still not willing to take the risk. I'd like to see some actual evidence of the product's quality before committing to a purchase.

I understand your concerns, Bob, and I respect your cautious approach. However, I want to assure you that this product is a great value at $100. You'll be supporting a small business like mine and getting a unique product that not many others have. Plus, I'm willing to give you a 30-day money-back guarantee. If you're not satisfied, you can return it and get a full refund. What do you say? Is the risk worth the potential reward?
I'll take the product. I'm willing to take the risk and see if it's worth it.
